lead_paragraph: KILVERT--B. Cory, Peterborough, New Hampshire. B. Cory Kilvert, Jr., 86, died on March 23, 2016 at Monadnock Community Hospital in Peterborough, NH. Cory is survived by his wife Terry Rogers Kilvert, his sister, Janice Kilvert Murray; his children: Cory, Nancy, Kate, Gwen, Sarah and Tim; grandchildren; great-grandchildren; and nieces and nephews. To view an online obituary, please visit jellisonfuneralhome.com. 1

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  KILVERT, B. CORY, PETERBOROUGH, NEW HAMPSHIRE. B. CORY KILVERT, JR., 86, DIED ON MARCH 23, 2016 AT MONADNOCK COMMUNITY HOSPITAL IN PETERBOROUGH, NH. CORY IS SURVIVED BY HIS WIFE TERRY ROGERS KILVERT, HIS SISTER, JANICE KILVERT MURRAY; HIS CHILDREN: CORY, NANCY, KATE, GWEN, SARAH AND TIM; GRANDCHILDREN; GREAT, GRANDCHILDREN; AND NIECES AND NEPHEWS. TO VIEW AN ONLINE OBITUARY, PLEASE VISIT JELLISONFUNERALHOME.COM. 1
